doc:
Jean-Pierre Léaud https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Pierre_L%C3%A9aud 0 Jean-Pierre Léaud, ComM (French: [ʒɑ̃pjɛʁ le.o]; born 28 May 1944) is a French actor, best known for playing Antoine Doinel in François Truffaut's series of films about that character, beginning with The 400 Blows (Les Quatre Cents Coups, 1959). He also worked several times with Jean-Luc Godard, and is a significant figure of the French New Wave. Jean-Pierre_Léaud , ComM ( French : [_ʒɑ̃pjɛʁ_le.o_] ; born_28_May_1944 ) is a_French_actor , best_known for playing Antoine_Doinel in François_Truffaut 's_series of films about that_character , beginning with The_400_Blows ( Les_Quatre_Cents_Coups , 1959 ) . He also worked several_times with Jean-Luc_Godard , and is a_significant_figure of the_French_New_Wave .
